::Spears::

She chuckled, "OK, OK, OK, point taken. I won't go running into a 
group of preds with a hostage anymore. I'll just let you walk in 
there and be all diplomatic like." she said with a big smirk on her 
face.
"We let the preds walk in, take what ever they want and then we let 
them go just to save on mech fluid."

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus grins. "How about the 'I'm dead, you slag!' look on 
Ramhorn's face if 
> Unitron took that the wrong way?"
